attributes.action: Require shops to keep their doors closed to help reduce climate change.
attributes.background: The amount of shops that leave their doors open, even in winter, letting the heat in the store out onto the street is extraordinary.  In Wimborne, Dorset today I found 4 shops (Seasalt, White Stuff, Holland & Barrett and Fatface) all with their doors open and heating being blown straight outside.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the shops concerned and not the UK Government and Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to raise awareness of energy efficiency on retail premises if that's something you would like to see happen.
